short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Effortlessly connect your LinkedIn account to Aimfox with this handy session manager. No password required.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A simple extension to connect your LinkedIn account to Aimfox.
Aimfox is a LinkedIn automation software that grows your LinkedIn network, at scale!
The extension uses your existing LinkedIn  browser session to securely connect or reconnect your LinkedIn account to Aimfox without having to enter your email and password.
